Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, towards the center of the shopping district.
Room.LongDescription: You are in the primary shopping district for the southwestern portion of Oceancrest. It is not the largest shopping district, but by far the most exclusive and expensive. The shops here cater to the discriminating shopper, not to the bums on the street. To the west, there is a large building. One of the signs on the door reads "Batton Locks & Picks". There is another door on both the east and west sides of the street to the south.
